NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
DAZ: Friends, Cassava and I write to you from Lovers' Cove. We eagerly await any update - how did the test of the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> today go?
2
1
YARROW: Greetings, my friends. The test has concluded - but I fear our goal is not yet within reach.. But thanks to the Deep Storm Station, we have sown the seeds of success in the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project.</color>
3 2
YARROW: But come, let us not be distracted by these results from a more important question!
4 3
YARROW: How did your plan to propose to Cassava during the negative time interval fare, Daz? All of us in the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> have been waiting anxiously to learn his answer!
5
4
CASSAVA: Wait a second! Was that how Daz was able to know my answer before I gave it?! For what purpose would he...
6
4
DAZ: He said yes! We're engaged, everybody! We're engaged!!
7
5
DAZ: Well, I.. I was afraid of the possibility you might feel differently.. That's why I.. wanted to see <color=orange>6 seconds into the future</color> of my proposal..
8
7
Cassava: Oh, Daz.. You mean the world to me... Of course I would say yes. But that means.. we had a time-traveling proposal of marriage! How many in existence could lay claim to that?!
9
8
Cassava: You have until the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is ready to craft an even grander marriage proposal to Clary, Yarrow!
10
9
Yarrow: Our romantic relationship has only begun recently! You know weâ€™re nowhere ready for that!!
CONV R2 1
DSS CONV3 4,7
